thread.title: BRIEF-State Street Reports First-Quarter 2018 EPS Of $1.62, Up 41%

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-State Street Reports First-Quarter 2018 EPS Of $1.62, Up 41%
text:
18 AM / a minute ago BRIEF-State Street Reports First-Quarter 2018 EPS Of $1.62, Up 41% Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 20 (Reuters) - State Street Corp: 
* STATE STREET REPORTS FIRST-QUARTER 2018 EPS OF $1.62, UP 41%, AND ROE OF 12.8%, UP 2.9 PERCENTAGE POINTS, COMPARED TO THE FIRST-QUARTER OF 2017 * QTRLY TOTAL EXPENSES $2,256 MILLION, UP 8.1 PERCENT 
* AUM AT Q1-END $2,729 BILLION VERSUS $2,561 BILLION AT Q1-END LAST YEAR * QTRLY TOTAL FEE REVENUE $2,363 MILLION, UP 7.5 PERCENT 
* STATE STREET-BASEL III TIER 1 CAPITAL RATIO BASED ON FULLY PHASED-IN ADVANCED APPROACHES (ESTIMATED) PRO-FORMA 15.4% AT Q1 END VERSUS 15.2% AT Q4 END 
* DUE TO ENACTMENT OF TCJA ,Q4 2017 INCLUDED ONE-TIME ESTIMATED NET COST OF $250 MILLION 
* STATE STREET- Q1 NET INTEREST INCOME ROSE FROM Q1 2017, PRIMARILY DUE TO HIGHER U.S. MARKET INTEREST RATES,DISCIPLINED LIABILITY PRICING,AMONG OTHERS 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.59, REVENUE VIEW $3.00 BILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
